item.title: Geb 101: Simple Scripts
item.description: These days Iâ€™m in between projects, so I decided to automate a task related to a web interface and a tedious list shaped as an HTML form. This automation would imply two processes: parsing an HTML page and filling some fields in another page, plus some small and simple processing. I had two options, to use HTTP directly through HTTP Builder or something like that or to code various small scripts with Geb.
